a.title: Monsanto Donates $25K to School Weather Project

div.p: Monsanto recently donated $25,000.00 to Dongola Unit School District to fund weather station project. Dongola was one of 3 schools in the state of IL to receive such a donation! -CLICK TO READ MORE-

p.strong: Parents & Students, please complete this form (new window) to help us better understand your technology usage and availability!

section.h2: Welcome to Dongola Unit School District #66
section.p: One of our primary goals is for our district to be a community of learners and leaders. Our students will realize a sense of belonging and pride while growing intellectually, emotionally, and socially. We focus on the continual improvement of our district and on strong, effective communication among all stakeholders (students, teachers, families, friends, and community members). Efficient partnerships among all stakeholders is one of our highest priorities.
Please feel free to contact us if you have additional questions. Thank you for visiting our website!

div.div: Our mission is to teach all students so that they can attain their maximum educational potential & become productive, contributing citizens in our society.
Respect Yourself, Respect Others, Respect Property

Dr. Paige Maginel, Superintendent
Salina Hilliard, Principal
Ellie Rush, Director of Curriculum & Instruction

Principal's Office Phone: (618) 827-3524
Fax: (618) 827-4422
Email: Salina Hilliard
Email: Ellie Rush
Email: Janice Micheal
Superintendent's Office Phone: (618) 827-3841
Fax: (618) 827-4641
Email: Dr Paige Maginel
Email: School Board
Email: Joni Lewis

PTO meets on the first Tuesday of every month at 7pm. For more information please contact the principals office.
-Leslie Treat, PTO President
